Text.val: 19.10.2006 AK SCR11924 extended the where SQL variable from 200 to alpha 500
10.10.2006 AK SCR11924 added pi.From_CCDU_table? to select countries from CCDU
21.04.2006 SH SCR10794 Added PI.CTRY_COMMISSIONGROUP, uses to extended
if pi.From_CCDU_table? is true only countries with rows in table CCDU will
apear on the selection screen (updating variable 'v.SQL_Where')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct ccdu302_country from :1/ccdu where ccdu302_admno=:2 and ccdu302_clntno=:3
